Commands.Punch Rush: 4-HIT melee BRV attack  Grants 「Duel」 for 3 turns and 「Medium Max BRV Up」 for 6 turns  Inflicts 「Small Defense Down」 for 3 turns  「Duel」 raises Attack
Commands.BRV Attack+: 1-HIT melee BRV attack  Low Action Delay
Commands.Burning Rave: Raises BRV by 1.2 before dealing a 2-HIT AoE ranged BRV+HP attack  20% HP damage dealt to non-targets  Removes 「Duel」
Commands.Booya: 1-HIT Thunder melee BRV attack  Grants 「Duel」 for 3 turns and 「Medium Max BRV Up」 for 6 turns  Inflicts 「Small Defense Down」 for 3 turns  「Duel」 raises Attack
Commands.Set Duel Blow: 2-HIT melee BRV attack  Grants 「Duel」 for 6 turns  Slightly raises the Max BRV overflow limit for 2 turns  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Different Beat: 9-HIT melee BRV+HP attack  BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV  Grants 「Duel」 for 6 turns  Turns 「BRV Attack」 to 「Burning Combo」 and 「HP Attack」 to 「Meteor Combo」
Commands.Burning Combo: 4-HIT melee BRV attack  Inflicts 「Small Defense Down」 for 3 turns  Grants 「Medium Max BRV Up」 for 6 turns  Raises BRV based on Attack then by 1.2  Follows up with a 2-HIT ranged BRV+HP attack  Deals 50% damage to non-targets  Low Action Delay  Removes 「Duel」  Turns 「Burning Combo」 and 「Meteor Combo」 back to their original state
Commands.Meteor Combo: 1-HIT BRV attack  Inflicts 「Small Defense Down」 for 3 turns.  Grants 「Medium Max BRV Up」 and 「Small Attack Up」 for 6 turns  Follows up with a 1-HIT melee BRV+HP attack  Low Action Delay  Removes 「Duel」  Turns 「Burning Combo」 and 「Meteor Combo」 back to their original state

Passives.High Tension: Slightly raises Attack for 3 turns when the battle starts
Passives.Punch Rush Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using  Punch Rush
Passives.Smash Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after initiating a Chase Sequence
Passives.Booya Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using  Booya
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy
Passives.Duel Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed while  Duel  is active
Passives.Self-taught Martial Arts: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt while  Duel  is active
Passives.Punch Rush Extend: When using  Punch Rush :- Integrates  Max BRV Up  and  Attack Up  buffs to unique buff  Balamb's Hothead - Triggers an HP attack after use- Lowers Action Delay- When HP is over 50%, triggers  Booya  + HP attackWhen using  Burning Rave :- Increases the number of BRV hits to 4- Tremendously raises total BRV potency- Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV- Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets- Lowers Action DelayWhen using  BRV Attack+ :- Increases the number of BRV hits to 2- Greatly raises total BRV potency
Passives.Buff Boost: Moderately raises Max BRV while buffed
Passives.Booya Extend: When using  Punch Rush :- Increases the number of BRV hits to 2- Slightly raises total BRV potency- Integrates  Max BRV Up  and  Attack Up  buffs to unique buff  Balamb's Hothead - Triggers an HP attack after use- Lowers Action Delay- When HP is over 50%, triggers  Punch Rush  + HP attackWhen using  Meteor Barrage :- Increases the number of BRV hits to 5- Tremendously raises total BRV potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 180% Max BRV- Lowers Action Delay
Passives.Radiance of Destruction and Power: Raises Max BRV and Attack by 20%
Passives.Set Duel Long Extend: When using  Set Duel Long :- Slightly raises Max BRV overflow limit

Weapons.Maverick CP: 15: When using  Punch Rush ,  Burning Rave :- Raises BRV potencyWhen using  Punch Rush :- Extends the duration of  Duel
Weapons.Ehrgeiz CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability  Different Beat
Weapons.Gauntlet CP: 35: Booya  use +2When using  Booya ,  Meteor Barrage :- Raises BRV potencyWhen using  Booya :- Extends the duration of  Duel - Improves  Defense Down - Grants  Small Physical Attack Up  for 6 turns
Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Set Duel Long  use +1Duration of  Max BRV Overflow  effect +2 turns
